mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, O_STATUS, NVL(SUM(a.cnt), 0) CNT FROM ( SELECT O_STATUS, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ORDERS WHERE O_IDX LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%' AND O_STORE = #{O_STORE} GROUP BY O_STATUS ) a , ( SELECT LEVEL AS DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LEVEL) RNUM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=3 ) b WHERE b.DT=a.O_STATUS(+) GROUP BY a.O_STATUS, b.DT, b.RNUM ORDER BY b.DT
